attributes.action: stop the police from investigating themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the police must not be allowed to investigate themselves,this leads to state corruption in almost every case.
from personal experience each case ends
in a police whitewash the more serious
the case the bigger the whitewash, this is from personal experience,we need and independant body to police the police.

rejection.details: An independent body to investigate complaints about the police already exists - the Independent Police Complaints Commission. You can find out more about the IPCC here: http://www.ipcc.gov.uk/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
